name: Preppers: The Game
description:
Preppers: The Game is an interactive adventure where you learn about prepping, survivalism and the impact these have on the body and mind.

With two distinct routes to play (prepper or survivalist) alongside IRL minigames, tasks, reflections and guided meditations, Preppers explores the links between prepping, survivalism and optimism.

Prepping...it's hope in practical form.

Preppers: The Game was originally commissioned by Casson & Friends for the Amazon Alexa (published in December 2020).
